comments:
This problem does not show up in a new workspace.  In an old workspace, where I 
have some information, I tried to import a log file.  In the log import wizard, 
I get a null pointer exception when I click the Add button.  This behaviour is 
inconsistent, as it only occurs in some circumstances or workspace that is 
setup in some way.  Below is the stack trace:

Can you please attach the workspace that triggered the exception

I cannot attach the workspace because it's too big for an attachment.  I'll 
send it to in a note.

The reason of the problem is that there is a deprecated method call in a 
internal utility class.

The problem reported is related to populating monitor list in Destination tab 
UI. After clicking Add button and throwing null pointer exception, program does 
not populate monitor list so we can not see anything in the monitor list.

The problem occures only when opening the particular workspace created by the 
latest code but not all workspace.

More investigations needed.
